ui.panel.zwave_js.dashboard.introduction: Manage your Z-Wave network and Z-Wave nodes
ui.panel.zwave_js.dashboard.dump_debug: Download a dump of your network to help diagnose issues
ui.panel.zwave_js.dashboard.dump_dead_no: Some of your nodes are dead
Some of your nodes didn't respond and are assumed dead. These will not be fully exported.
ui.panel.zwave_js.dashboard.dump_not_rea: Not all nodes are ready yet
If you create an export while not all nodes are ready, you could miss needed data. Give your network some time to query all nodes. Do you want to continue with the dump?
ui.panel.zwave_js.add_node.title: Add a Z-Wave Node
ui.panel.zwave_js.add_node.introduction: This wizard will guide you through adding a node to your Z-Wave network.
ui.panel.zwave_js.add_node.secure_inclus: Secure devices require additional bandwidth; too many secure devices can slow down your Z-Wave network. We recommend only using secure inclusion for devices that require it, like locks or garage door openers.
ui.panel.zwave_js.add_node.controller_in: Your Z-Wave controller is now in inclusion mode.
ui.panel.zwave_js.add_node.follow_device: Follow the directions that came with your device to trigger pairing on the device.
ui.panel.zwave_js.add_node.inclusion_fai: The node could not be added. Please check the logs for more information.
ui.panel.zwave_js.add_node.inclusion_fin: The node has been added. It may take a few minutes for all entities to show up as we finish setting up the node in the background.
ui.panel.zwave_js.remove_node.title: Remove a Z-Wave Node
ui.panel.zwave_js.remove_node.introducti: Remove a node from your Z-Wave network, and remove the associated device and entities from Home Assistant.
ui.panel.zwave_js.remove_node.controller: Your Z-Wave controller is now in exclusion mode.
ui.panel.zwave_js.remove_node.follow_dev: Follow the directions that came with your device to trigger exclusion on the device.
ui.panel.zwave_js.remove_node.exclusion_: The node could not be removed. Please check the logs for more information.
Node {id} has been removed from your Z-Wave network.
